title: President Trump’s Budget Plan, Simon to Buy Taubman
itunes:title: President Trump’s Budget Plan, Simon to Buy Taubman
description:
Bloomberg News White House Reporter Justin Sink discusses President Trump's budget plan. Bloomberg News Real Estate Reporter Natalie Wong walks through Simon’s plan to buy Taubman. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Mark Bergen talk about a profile of YouTube kids star Jay Jeon. Andy Browne, Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director, shares his insight on the high price of China’s censorship. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
